overview: CO-Founder & CEO of Broadcast.mobi. Broadcast is a mobile application that allows any social networker to create and share simultaneously multimedia content, easy, fast and on the go, to the most popular networks. He is System Engineer, MBA in Media and Entertainment, professor member of the Online Advertising Executive Program at Universidad de Palermo, as well as member of the Argentinean E-commerce Chamber. He worked for international companies such as Time Warner, America Online and Grupo Clarin.
